text: We Have a Ghost is a 2023 American comedy horror movie directed by Christopher Landon from a screenplay also by him. It stars David Harbour, Jahi Winston, Tig Notaro, Jennifer Coolidge, and Anthony Mackie. It is based on a 2017 short story called Ernest written by Geoff Manaugh. We Have a Ghost was released on February 24, 2023, by Netflix. It received mixed reviews from movie critics. ==Plot== Finding a ghost named Ernest haunting their new home turns Kevin's family into overnight social media sensations. But when Kevin and Ernest investigate the mystery of Ernest's past, they become a target of the CIA. ==Cast== In addition, Dr. Phil McGraw has a cameo appearance as himself. ==References== Category:2023 comedy movies Category:2023 horror movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American horror movies
title: We Have a Ghost
